org.openimaj.image.contour

Class ContourFollowingStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.image.contour.ContourFollowingStrategy
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MooreNeighborStrategy, SuzukiNeighborStrategy

    public abstract class ContourFollowingStrategy
extends Object
    A contour Following strategy implements a Contour Tracing algorithm that extracts a boundary from an image

    Many examples can be found in this tutorial.

    Author:
    Sina Samangooei (ss@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<org.openimaj.image.pixel.Pixel> contour(org.openimaj.image.FImage image, org.openimaj.image.pixel.Pixel start, org.openimaj.image.pixel.Pixel from)
      Follow the contour, adding each pixel to a list.
      abstract void contour(org.openimaj.image.FImage image, org.openimaj.image.pixel.Pixel start, org.openimaj.image.pixel.Pixel from, org.openimaj.util.function.Operation<org.openimaj.image.pixel.Pixel> operation)
      Given some starting pixel in an image on a contour and the direction of a non starting image, return each pixel on a contour from the start pixel in the image.

    • Method Detail

      • contour

        public List<org.openimaj.image.pixel.Pixel> contour(org.openimaj.image.FImage image,
                                           org.openimaj.image.pixel.Pixel start,
                                           org.openimaj.image.pixel.Pixel from)
        Follow the contour, adding each pixel to a list. The first pixel in the list is guaranteed to the be equal to start
        Parameters:
        image - the image
        start - the starting point on the contour
        from - the pixel that was not a contour
        Returns:
        a list of contour pixels in the image starting from the start pixel

      • contour

        public abstract void contour(org.openimaj.image.FImage image,
           org.openimaj.image.pixel.Pixel start,
           org.openimaj.image.pixel.Pixel from,
           org.openimaj.util.function.Operation<org.openimaj.image.pixel.Pixel> operation)
        Given some starting pixel in an image on a contour and the direction of a non starting image, return each pixel on a contour from the start pixel in the image. The first pixel returned must be the start pixel
        Parameters:
        image - the image
        start - the first point on the contour
        from - the pixel that was not a contour
        operation - the thing to do for each contour pixel found
